detaileddescription.para: which returns true iff p, q, and r are collinear.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

para.computeroutput: bool operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, FT w)
bool operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, FT w)
bool operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s, FT w)

detaileddescription.para: which compare the weight of the smallest sphere orthogonal to the input weighted point(s) with the input weight.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

para.computeroutput: FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s)

detaileddescription.para: which returns an approximation of the signed dihedral angle in the tetrahedron pqrs of edge pq. The sign is negative if orientation(p,q,r,s) is CGAL::NEGATIVE and positive otherwise. The angle is given in degrees.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

para.computeroutput: FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r)

detaileddescription.para: which returns the area of the triangle p, q, r.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

para.computeroutput: FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s, Point_3 t)

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared radius of the sphere centered in t and orthogonal to the sphere orthogonal to p, q, r, and s.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared area of the triangle t.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared distance between two points p and q.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared length of v.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared radius of the sphere s.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

para.computeroutput: FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s)
FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r)

detaileddescription.para: which returns the squared radius of the smallest sphere orthogonal to the argument(s).

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

para.computeroutput: FT operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s)

detaileddescription.para: which respectively return the volume of the tetrahedron formed by the points p, q, r, and s and of the tetrahedron t.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the weight of the weighted point p.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Vector_3 operator()(Plane_3 p, int index),

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Vector_3 operator()(Plane_3 p),
which returns a vector that is orthogonal to the plane p and directed to the positive side of p.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Point_3 operator()(Sphere_3 q),
which returns the center of the sphere s.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

detaileddescription.para: Point_3 operator()(Weighted_point_3 p, Weighted_point_3 q, Weighted_point_3 r, Weighted_point_3 s),
Point_3 operator()(Weighted_point_3 p, Weighted_point_3 q, Weighted_point_3 r, Weighted_point_3 s),
Point_3 operator()(Weighted_point_3 p, Weighted_point_3 q, Weighted_point_3 r, Weighted_point_3 s),
which return the center of the smallest orthogonal sphere to the input weighted points.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operators:

detaileddescription.para: Point_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r),
Point_3 operator()(Tetrahedron_3 t),
which respectively return the centroid of the points p, q, and r, and the centroid of the tetrahedron t.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Point_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q),
which returns the midpoint of the segment pq.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Vector_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r),
which returns the normal of the vectors q-p and r-p.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Sphere_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q),
which returns the smallest sphere which passes through the points p and q.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Tetrahedron_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q, Point_3 r, Point_3 s),
which returns the tetrahedron with vertices p, q, r, and s.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Point_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Vector_3 v),
which returns the point obtained by translating p by the vector v.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: Vector_3 operator()(Point_3 p, Point_3 q),
which returns a vector from two points.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns -v.

briefdescription.para: A constructor object that must provide the function operator:

detaileddescription.para: which returns the vector v scaled by a factor scale.

para.computeroutput: std::optional< std::variant< T... > > operator()(Segment_3 s, Plane_3 p)
std::optional< std::variant< T... > > operator()(Ray_3 r, Iso_cuboid i)
std::optional< std::variant< T... > > operator()(Segment_3 s, Iso_cuboid i)

detaileddescription.para: which returns the intersection region of two geometrical objects.

description.para: The following functions give access to the predicate and construction objects:

briefdescription.para: The concept MeshTriangulationTraits_3 describes the requirements for the geometric traits class of the underlying regular triangulation used during a mesh generation process.

listitem.para: All models of the CGAL concept Kernel

detaileddescription.para: In addition to the requirements described for the traits class RegularTriangulationTraits_3, the geometric traits class of a regular triangulation used in mesh generation must fulfill the following requirements.
